page.title: 15RUDDINGTON SENIOR CITIZENS
page.content: The elderly are well cared for in { {RUDDINGTON}as there are purpose built bungalows with a warden on call and three{Old Peoples Homes.}One is {LEYS {COURT }where they can have flats with kitchens and eat meals in the dining room. There are also various entertainments laid on for them. {SOUTH MANOR }is in a house built 146 years ago for a wealthy family.It is now a County Council Home for the elderly and also has a short stay centre. The oldest person is Mrs. Woodward who is 98. The Matron has 20 part-time nurses to help look after the residents.She said "It just evolved that she became matron but she enjoys it anyway." I think its a good job because if there were not homes like this the old people would have to go in to hospitals.
